original_text: So Philip ran to him and heard him reading Isaiah the prophet and asked, “Do you understand what you are reading?”
korean_text: 빌립이 달려가서 선지자 이사야의 글 읽는 것을 듣고 말하되 읽는 것을 깨닫느냐

sentences.original_text: and heard him reading Isaiah the prophet
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 선지자 이사야를 읽는 소리를 들었습니다

sentences.original_text: “Do you understand what you are reading?”
